entry.title: $2549 // STUNNING DUPLEX! NO FEE* PRIVATE ROOFDECK+BALCONY
entry.content:
GORGEOUS NEW TWO BEDROOM GUTT RENOVATED DUPLEX IN THE HOTTEST PART OF Crown Heights!!!!

Full modern bathroom!
Virtual Door man!
Large windows offer tons of natural sun light.
Modern kitchen with all new STAINLESS STEEL appliances!
Gorgeous bathroom offers maximum privacy.
Closet space in the bedroom.
Hardwood floors throughout the ENTIRE apartment!
Gorgeous PRIVATE SPACIOUS roof deck!!!
PRIVATE roof-deck and balcony!

Right near nice restaurants, shops, grocery stores, and bars!
One minute walk from the A and C trains: a ride to Manhattan in minutes!

There is an amazing Outdoor roof deck with tonz of space!

***PETS ALLOWED***
***NO FEE***
***GUARANTORS WELCOME***

Call or email today for a PRIVATE showing before it's GONE!!!
